name: Akrivia
description: Akrivia HCM is a unified HRMS SaaS platform that packs in everything you need to manage your entire employee lifecycle. With 9 HR products and 40+ modules – from recruitment & learning to performance, payroll & offboarding , the Akrivia HCM suite is powered by AI to automate all your  mundane tasks and give you a strategic edge. Akrivia's digital solution is designed for change agility and creating a captivating employee value proposition
